review: The Salvori Exclusive Gradient 'Blue-Plated' Guitar Capo is a fantastic addition to my guitar accessories. The build quality is top-notch, with a sturdy zinc alloy body that ensures durability and a secure grip on the guitar neck. The blue-plated finish is not only beautiful but also adds a unique touch to my instrument. The capo's industrial-strength spring prevents any fret buzz, and the silicone cushion protects my strings from scratches. The 3-in-1 design, including a pick holder and string puller, is incredibly practical. At $19.99, this capo offers excellent value for its price and is a must-have for any guitarist. Highly recommended!
